app_description: Georgian Keyboard and Translator If you want to write something in Georgian but have still not mastered the language use this Georgian keyboard and translator the best Georgian keyboard and translator for iOS. You can easily write and if there is any mistake or you are not able to recall some particular word that would fit it offers an auto suggestion very quickly and more importantly very precisely. Even if you are an expert at Georgian language you can use this Georgian keyboard and translator iOS that has a multitude of features and functionalities to make your message appealing to the eye and compelling to the mind of the reader. This best Georgian Keyboard And Translator for iOS has been researched very well so whatever word you intend to write it picks it up without offering irrelevant word suggestions. This is the reason that makes it the best Georgian Keyboard And Translator for iOS users. Next once you write in Georgian you can translate the text to any language of the world just by a few clicks. So you can compare your content both in intent and syntax with other languages easily. Complete your Georgian writing tasks very easily with this Georgian keyboard and Translator for iOS. Change font colors keyboard skins background images and what not. This Georgian Keyboard And Translator is all yours to explore. App Features Easily write messages in Georgian language with the Georgian keyboard for iOS. Changing the font the colour underlining features inbuilt in this Georgian keyboard iOS. Directly share messages or delete them with the best Georgian Keyboard And Translator for iOS as you d like. Keypress sound functionality and vibration functionality to make tying feel fun. Change colours for the Background colour Key background colour Keyboard text colour Suggestion box colour etc so that typing does not seem boring and monotonous with this Georgian keyboard for iOS. With the Georgian keyboard for iOS you can even set your own image in the background. If you do not wish to spend a lot of time in the setup use the default theme that comes in built in the best Georgian Keyboard and Translator for iOS. A colour picker allows you to pick any colour of your choice. You can also pick out from the many available themes for the keyboard. Another important feature in the Georgian keyboard and Translator and one that makes this the best Georgian keyboard and Translator for iOS is its adaptability with apps. Use the keyboard extension feature to type Georgian directly into any app. If you later wish to translate your Georgian message to any other language you can easily do so as there are a number of languages already pre installed in this Georgian keyboard and Translator with iOS software. How To Use Install the application from Apple AppStore as it is meant for iOS users. Once the software for this best Georgian keyboard and Translator for iOS is installed you can use the enable extension feature in this app to sync it with any other app where you want to start writing Georgian. Now use the apps background and theme settings to customise before you start typing or go with the default theme in the best Georgian Keyboard for iOS. Once you start typing you can underline colour or change the font of any letter to emphasise or de emphasise it in this best Georgian Keyboard And Translator for iOS. Once you re done with your writing in Georgian you can use the translator feature in the best Georgian Keyboard And Translator for iOS to convert the text into any other language as well.
